channel.title: VMworldeurope on Chris Neales Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VMworldeurope on Chris Neales Blog

item.title: VMworld - Finally at the Frontier!
item.description: I am here. I’m in Barcelona. Tomorrow I will be attending the partner day activities and following that such amazing things as the vExpert party! I lie here in my Chintz Pink Hotel (Picture attached at the end) marvelling that this has actually come off. I have spent 2-3 weeks sorting this out. I won’t go into details but suffice to say the red tape I’ve had to negotiate has involved things that, in peace-time, no person should have to endure.
